lines:
I shall with you again abent

too late

to go do so get.

dam song to go to andre

sorn

Recor

mm

I will not be able to 
before the ab inst. as un

mind gear finals will begin this 
Huredan. I shall get chungt 
on ite do t and debell 
write you about chat leme as 
to my

I have made and 
appointment with Mrs. Lunde 
to spend a week end weiter

coming.

entertainment in 
Welleslen

evesley was a great succes 
I shall hope to arrange a 
date wide abbott acad 
for a similar entertaine 
purpone - per te bempita 
ter Flord relies. If posible 
I shall arrange to have den

cademy boys go down to Abbott 
chus quine me a bigger audience 
I shall like to talk sus over 
mit gan when I came. I plan 
to habe tes entertainment cher 
middle o Febmary at the latest.

d nave me

trand

on

expect to

tan

penso, I shall 
fulfil that apponation 
em sure I can

lune

Camme
raw: I shall with you again abent too late to go do so get. dam song to go to andre sorn Recor mm I will not be able to before the ab inst. as un mind gear finals will begin this Huredan. I shall get chungt on ite do t and debell write you about chat leme as to my I have made and appointment with Mrs. Lunde to spend a week end weiter coming. entertainment in Welleslen evesley was a great succes I shall hope to arrange a date wide abbott acad for a similar entertaine purpone per te bempita ter Flord relies. If posible I shall arrange to have den cademy boys go down to Abbott chus quine me a bigger audience I shall like to talk sus over mit gan when I came. I plan to habe tes entertainment cher middle o Febmary at the latest. d nave me trand on expect to tan penso, I shall fulfil that apponation em sure I can lune Camme

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter in which Kwan states that he will see Mrs. Lynde on the 26th, notes that the Wellesley celebration was a success and he would like to offer a similar event at Phillips Academy, including Abbot students. The Chinese New Year celebration for Boston Chinese students will be hosted by Prof. Norton A. Kent. News about the Chinese War Mission speakers: Dr. Koo gave a good speech.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
